## BlockSvg.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `BlockSvg` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(workspace: WorkspaceSvg, prototypeName: string, opt_id?: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md) | The block's workspace. |
|  prototypeName | string | Name of the language object containing type-specific functions for this block. |
|  opt\_id | string | _(Optional)_ Optional ID. Use this ID if provided, otherwise create a new ID. |
